info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 15 at 3:55PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Mississippi and northwestern Lauderdale Counties through 430 PM CDT... At 355 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Burdette, or near Blytheville, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Blytheville, Burdette, Ashport, Barr, Burton, Barfield, Armorel, Lens Ford, O`Donnell Bend, Tomato and Rosa. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CDT for eastern Arkansas...and west Tennessee.
